DOC.brief_summary: This one-day , randomize , double-masked , single-center evaluation efficacy safety PRX-100 ophthalmic solution compare placebo 20 subject ( randomized 4:1 , PRX-100 : placebo ) evaluate safety PRX-100 magnitude duration effect improve near-vision acuity .
